title: Learning the MVC method
text: Placement of the folders is key to understanding the MVC method. Starting with the model folder will help you follow the method.

title: Folders are important
text: Allowing yourself to bounce often between folders is important in creating the MVC method. You will find yourself doing this often.

title: Resources
text: There are many videos and documentation you can read to discover your method of learning how to set up the MVC method. Keep searching, but I found it easiest to set up each folder as I wrote my code; that way I stayed in order.

title: new tech
text: Wired is an interesting and fun source of all tech news. What is the latest, greatest and what is on the rise.
